page.title: 17CHELMONDISTON V.C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: We begin this school when we are nearly five and leave after eleven. We have four classrooms for different ages,each with its own teacher. Our lessons begin at 9 o'clock. They are quite normal like Mathematics,History, Geography, Computers, Art, Topic, Science, English, Music and Games. We do not always work in the classroom, sometimes we work in the practical area, and sometimes we work outside. Sometimes we work with partners and in groups. Some of us like to take our work home. We have a lot of equipment to help us, like television, video, cassette recorders and projectors. We join other schools for P.E. activities and Musical Performances. In Summer we visit the local High School to swim. At lunch-time we have Clubs for Athletics, Table-tennis, Football,Netball,Choir, Recorders and Country-dancing.
